title: Godzilla: Past, Present, Future
description: Godzilla is a threat to the entire planet, and only G-Force has the resources to track, study, and contain the King of the Monsters. See Godzilla battle the All-Terraintula, big-game hunters from another world, a mad scientist with a time machine, and the Spanish Armada? It`s horror on the high seas and terror on the Titanic when Godzilla takes to time travel.
author: Arthur Adams
